mapper.insert: insert into TOKEN_INFO (IDX, USER_ID, CLIENT_IP, SYSTEM_TYPE, TOKEN, EXPIRED_AT, STATUS) values (SEQ_TOKEN_INFO.nextval, #{userId}, #{clientIp}, #{systemType}, #{token}, #{expiredAt}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, USER_ID, CLIENT_IP, SYSTEM_TYPE, TOKEN, CREATED_AT, EXPIRED_AT, STATUS, IS_USED, UPDATED_AT FROM TOKEN_INFO WHERE TOKEN = #{token} AND STATUS = 'ACTIVE' AND IS_USED = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE TOKEN_INFO SET STATUS = 'EXPIRED', EXPIRED_AT = SYSDATE, UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE TOKEN = #{token} AND STATUS = 'ACTIVE' AND IS_USED = 'N'
UPDATE TOKEN_INFO SET STATUS = 'EXPIRED', IS_USED = 'Y', EXPIRED_AT = SYSDATE, UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE TOKEN = #{token} AND STATUS = 'ACTIVE' AND IS_USED = 'N'
